item.name: Nosoi Charm
entries: Nosois serve as scribes and messengers to psychopomps. They are rare outside of the Boneyard, so it's common for psychopomps venturing to other planes to carry a nosoi facsimile to aid in their travels. This tiny icon of a masked raven emits twittering sounds in perfect accompaniment to your performances. You gain a +2 item bonus to {@skill Performance} checks to play an instrument, orate, or sing. You can cast {@spell sending} once per day as a divine innate spell.

You twist the base of the charm, and the twittering it emits becomes {@condition helpful} words to boost your arguments. You lose the item bonus to {@skill Performance} checks and gain a +2 item bonus to {@skill Diplomacy} checks to make Requests until you use this activation again.

You gain lifesense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet for 1 hour as long as you continue to hold the charm. This allows you to sense the life force that animates living creatures and the perverse force that animates the dead, though you can't distinguish between the two.
The item bonus to {@skill Performance} or {@skill Diplomacy} is +3. You gain lifesense as long as you are holding the charm, and you don't need to activate it.
